attributes.action: Begin a round-the-clock COVID-19 vaccination programme
attributes.additional_details: In order to begin going back to a reasonable normal way of life, vaccination against COVID-19 is key. Almost every person in the country has been impacted in the last year. Continuous vaccination will speed up this process and many are already vocal in wishing to receive the jab at whatever time of day in order to achieve this, and to prevent further, and avoidable, detriment to our lives; socially, economically, mentally and physically.
attributes.background: If there are available doses, a straightforward booking system and sufficient and capable individuals able to administer such vaccines, to begin as soon as possible a 24 hour, 7 days per week COVID-19 vaccination programme.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/565197
